languages.text: {n}Стоит взгляду потустороннего создания скользнуть по вам, как все ваше нутро содрогается от ужаса. Из теней памяти всплывают воспоминания о {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}пережитых{/d} некогда кошмарах варпа... и парализуют вашу волю.{/n}

{n}As the otherworldly creature's gaze slides over you, your entire core shudders in terror. Flashes of {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}past warp nightmares{/d} reemerge from the shadows of your memory... and paralyse your will.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Стоит взгляду потустороннего создания скользнуть по вам, как все ваше нутро содрогается от ужаса. Из теней памяти всплывают воспоминания о {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}пережитых{/d} некогда кошмарах варпа... и парализуют вашу волю.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}As the otherworldly creature's gaze slides over you, your entire core shudders in terror. Flashes of past warp nightmares reemerge from the shadows of your memory... and paralyse your will.{/n}
{n}As the otherworldly creature's gaze slides over you, your entire core shudders in terror. Flashes of past warp nightmares reemerge from the shadows of your memory... and paralyse your will.{/n}
{n}As the otherworldly creature's gaze slides over you, your entire core shudders in terror. Flashes of past warp nightmares reemerge from the shadows of your memory... and paralyse your will.{/n}
{n}As the otherworldly creature's gaze slides over you, your entire core shudders in terror. Flashes of past warp nightmares reemerge from the shadows of your memory... and paralyse your will.{/n}

languages.text: {n}当这只古怪的生物目光掠过你时，你的整个心脏都在恐惧中颤抖不止。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}亚空间给你留下的噩梦{/d}，从你记忆的阴影中再次浮现……麻痹了你的意志。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As the otherworldly creature's gaze slides over you, your entire core shudders in terror. Flashes of {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}past warp nightmares{/d} reemerge from the shadows of your memory... and paralyse your will.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当这只古怪的生物目光掠过你时，你的整个心脏都在恐惧中颤抖不止。亚空间给你留下的噩梦，从你记忆的阴影中再次浮现……麻痹了你的意志。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La criatura sobrenatural te mira y todo tu ser se estremece, aterrado. Los destellos de {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}pesadillas anteriores provocadas por la disformidad{/d} surgen de tus recuerdos... inmovilizando tu voluntad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As the otherworldly creature's gaze slides over you, your entire core shudders in terror. Flashes of {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}past warp nightmares{/d} reemerge from the shadows of your memory... and paralyse your will.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La criatura sobrenatural te mira y todo tu ser se estremece, aterrado. Los destellos de pesadillas anteriores venidas de la disformidad surgen de tus recuerdos... inmovilizando tu voluntad.{/n}

languages.text: {n}この世のものとは思えぬ生物の眼差しがあなたを過り、全身が恐怖に震える。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}過去の<歪み>の悪夢{/d}が、閃光のように記憶の影から現れ…あなたの意志をマヒさせる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As the otherworldly creature's gaze slides over you, your entire core shudders in terror. Flashes of {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}past warp nightmares{/d} reemerge from the shadows of your memory... and paralyse your will.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}この世のものとは思えぬ生物の眼差しがあなたを過り、全身が恐怖に震える。過去の<歪み>の悪夢が、閃光のように記憶の影から現れ…あなたの意志をマヒさせる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Au moment où le regard de la créature surnaturelle se pose sur vous, vous sentez une vague de terreur vous submerger. Des tréfonds de votre mémoire émergent des {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}cauchemars du Warp{/d}... qui viennent paralyser jusqu'à votre volonté.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As the otherworldly creature's gaze slides over you, your entire core shudders in terror. Flashes of {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}past warp nightmares{/d} reemerge from the shadows of your memory... and paralyse your will.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Au moment où le regard de la créature surnaturelle se pose sur vous, vous sentez une vague de terreur vous submerger. Des tréfonds de votre mémoire émergent des cauchemars du Warp... qui viennent paralyser jusqu'à votre volonté.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als der Blick der andersweltlichen Kreatur über dich gleitet, erschaudert dein gesamtes Wesen vor Grauen. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}Frühere Warp-Albträume{/d} tauchen aus den Schatten deiner Erinnerung auf, zucken an deinem inneren Auge vorbei ... und lähmen deinen Willen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As the otherworldly creature's gaze slides over you, your entire core shudders in terror. Flashes of {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}past warp nightmares{/d} reemerge from the shadows of your memory... and paralyse your will.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Als der Blick der andersweltlichen Kreatur über dich gleitet, erschaudert dein gesamtes Wesen vor Grauen. Frühere Warp-Albträume tauchen aus den Schatten deiner Erinnerung auf, zucken an deinem inneren Auge vorbei ... und lähmen deinen Willen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Uhrevi yaratığın bakışları üzerinde gezinirken tüm benliğin dehşetle ürperiyor. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}Geçmişteki öteboyut kâbuslarının{/d} anlık görüntüleri, hafızanın derinliklerinden koparak tekrar yüzeye vuruyor... İradeni felce uğratıyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As the otherworldly creature's gaze slides over you, your entire core shudders in terror. Flashes of {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}past warp nightmares{/d} reemerge from the shadows of your memory... and paralyse your will.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Uhrevi yaratığın bakışları üzerinde gezinirken tüm benliğin dehşetle ürperiyor. Geçmişteki öteboyut kâbuslarının anlık görüntüleri, hafızanın derinliklerinden koparak tekrar yüzeye vuruyor... İradeni felce uğratıyorlar.{/n}

{n}Uhrevi yaratığın bakışları üzerinde gezinirken tüm benliğin dehşetle ürperiyor. Geçmişteki öteboyut kâbuslarının anlık görüntüleri, hafızanın derinliklerinden koparak tekrar yüzeye vuruyor... İradeni felce uğratıyorlar.{/n}
